attributes.action: Give the UK an extra Bank Holiday on the 12th for reaching the Finals regardless
attributes.additional_details:
ITSCOMINGHOME

COVID-19 has been a terrible time for us all, football has brought the people’s smiles back.

The country deserves the 12th off for England teaching the finals period

Football is coming home!
attributes.background:
Give the UK a day off on 12th July for England reaching the Euro 2020 Finals period. 
First finals in 55 years.. That deserves a toast of celebration and to reward the country for one of our proudest of moments as a country. 

Covid has been tough. Make us smile Borris.

ITSCOMINGHOME!

rejection.details: Unfortunately it can take up to 7 days to check petitions, so it's now past 12 July anyway.
